item.title: FUTU
item.description: score:11 Chances: S&P Expects A Steady Increase in Futu’s Overseas Client Base, Reaffirms Its BBB- Rating Futu Holdings Stock Shows Improved Relative Price Strength Futu Announces Plan for App Removal in Mainland China App Stores Moomoo Expands Into Malaysia Following Success In Singapore Futu Ranks #2 on Fortune’s 100 Fastest-Growing Companies List For 2022 Risks: Futu Announces Proposed Dual Primary Listing on The Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited Futu Provides Regulatory Update in China Futu Holdings Records Solid Growth in Q3 with US$247.
